sourcesContent:
product-item works!

> {{ product.name }}

Description: {{ product.description }}

rating: {{ product.rating }}

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-product-item', templateUrl: './product-item.component.html', styleUrls: ['./product-item.component.css'] }) export class ProductItemComponent { share(url : string) { var otvet = window.prompt() var link = "https://t.me/share/url?url="+url+"&text=" + otvet; window.open(link); } onNotify() { window.alert('You will be notified when the product goes on sale'); } }
